com.cognifide.slice.mapper.api

Interface Mapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericSlingMapper

    @ProviderType
public interface Mapper
    Mapper is an object that provides an abstract interface to content repository, providing some specific operations without exposing details of the repository. It provides a mapping from application calls to the persistence layer. This isolation separates the concerns of what data accesses the application needs, in terms of domain-specific objects and data types (the public interface of the Mapper), and how these can be satisfied with a repository (the implementation of the Mapper).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T get(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource, T object)
      Maps specified resource to specified object

    • Method Detail

      • get

        <T> T get(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
        T object)
        Maps specified resource to specified object
        Parameters:
        resource - resource representing repository node, cannot be null
        object - an empty object to be mapped
        Returns:
        specified object with appropriate fields mapped from specified resource
